short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Food Standards Agency hygene ratings on Hungry House listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RateThing grabs hygiene rating scores from the Food Standards Agency on Hungry House restaurant pages. It allows you to make better choices about where to order food from and avoid ordering from establishments with a poor hygiene record.
